problem_names:
lemma quicksort_correct :
  "\<lbrace>\<lambda>\<sigma>.   \<not>exec_stop \<sigma> \<and> quicksort_pre (lo, hi)(\<sigma>) \<and> \<sigma> = \<sigma>\<^sub>p\<^sub>r\<^sub>e \<rbrace>
     quicksort (lo, hi)
   \<lbrace>\<lambda>r \<sigma>. \<not>exec_stop \<sigma> \<and> quicksort_post(lo, hi)(\<sigma>\<^sub>p\<^sub>r\<^sub>e)(\<sigma>)(r) \<rbrace>"
translations:
lemma quicksort_correct :
  "\<lbrace>\<lambda>\<sigma>.   \<not>exec_stop \<sigma> \<and> quicksort_pre (lo, hi)(\<sigma>) \<and> \<sigma> = \<sigma>\<^sub>p\<^sub>r\<^sub>e \<rbrace>
     quicksort (lo, hi)
   \<lbrace>\<lambda>r \<sigma>. \<not>exec_stop \<sigma> \<and> quicksort_post(lo, hi)(\<sigma>\<^sub>p\<^sub>r\<^sub>e)(\<sigma>)(r) \<rbrace>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrace>\<lambda>\<sigma>.
                \<not> exec_stop \<sigma> \<and>
                quicksort_pre (lo, hi) \<sigma> \<and>
                \<sigma> = \<sigma>\<^sub>p\<^sub>r\<^sub>e\<rbrace>
    quicksort (lo, hi)
    \<lbrace>\<lambda>r \<sigma>.
                \<not> exec_stop \<sigma> \<and>
                quicksort_post (lo, hi) \<sigma>\<^sub>p\<^sub>r\<^sub>e
                 \<sigma> r\<rbrace>
